reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Been to Marianna before but wow what a change!Everything updated, even had a TV and microwave and most important of all air con.The same high standards of cleanliness as always but now a much nicer place to stay,would definitely go back.
reviews.title: what adifference

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have been to the Marianna for the last 10 years. It is a great place to stay with a very friendly atmosphere and Maria and the family are lovely! The staff work very hard to make your stay pleasant and the rooms are cleaned regularly with towels replaced. The food in the pool bar is of a good standard and Stella is very nice too! There can be some road noise but we dont find it a problem, the cockerels make more noise! As the saying goes - you dont know if you dont try it. At the end of the day it always comes back to personal choice, thats why we keep coming back. We love it and the family too! x
reviews.title: We keep coming back!
rig-up
reviews.text: got charged for things that we aparently broke.. however they were already damaged when we arrived. charged 50euros for bringing any1 back 2 your room at night! terrible hellhole! the people who were running the hotel were complete morons and tried 2 charge you 4 everything possible! never friendly. All they were intrested in was taking as much money off u as possible! do not go here at all costs!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just came back from our holiday from Tigaki fifth time and to the Marianna for first time but not last. We had a very pleasant holiday. Rooms always cleaned to a high standard. Large balconies with great views to sunset and the salt lake. We liked a lot the location of the hotel is out of the noise and close to everything. The staff was always friendly and helpful .Tigaki is a great resort for a safe and relaxing holiday. We will certainly recommend Marianna and Tigaki to all our friends. And we will be back once again next year.
reviews.title: Easy and low cost

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was my first holiday to Tigaki & Marianna and was memorable. Marianna offered extremely friendly environment with the family staff, a joy to see throughout the day. The room was spotless every day. We enjoyed a lot, our morning swimming in the lovely clean pool and our fresh made English breakfast by Stella. Also we relaxed a lot at the hotel’s bar drinking Vasili’s refreshing cocktails.
reviews.title: First time but not the last

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned after staying two weeks at the Marianna. We had a fantastic time and found the studios tobe perfect. Marianna was spotlessly clean; having a lovely pool and snack bar.
reviews.title: Great Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The studios themselves were well equipped and perfect for a two week break. Rooms were cleaned 6 times a week and towels and linens were changed twice a week.
reviews.title: Very clean & quiet

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found the owners to be really friendly and helpful and the bar area at the front was a great place to enjoy drinks in the evening.
reviews.title: Great budget apartments

reviews.text: Thanks for a lovely holiday, we will definately return!
reviews.title: Can't wait to go back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms are basic, with very hard, low beds, but spotless. Pool area is a little cramped but spotless too. Staff are very welcoming and are there if you need them otherwise they just let you get on with it. Nice bar area and the food from the snack bar is good.
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just come back from a week staying at Marianna studios with my boyfriend. We arrived early hours of the morning and were not greeted by anyone, however there was a post note with my surname allocating me to the room. I thought this a bit strange, but other than that there were no other negatives.
reviews.title: One of my best holidays - shall be going back.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Pool Area - clean, reasonable prices of food and drink, would recommend the special breakfast, always sunbeds free, pool nice and private away from the main road.
reviews.title: Perfect for basic no frills holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel room - clean, spacious, contained microwave, two hob cooker, kettle, utensils, saucepans, flat screen tv (not many channels but not on holiday to watch tv) nice sized balcony with washing line to dry wet clothing, secure balcony doors which were made up of shutters, netted doors and the glass doors, air conditioning (50euros per week) the maids would clean the room everyday and empty the bins, sheets and towels were replaced every other day.
reviews.title: LOVED EVERY MINUTE!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel - has been refurbished so all freshly painted, the bar area was lovely and the bar man was very friendly, plenty of drinks to choice from, recommend the cocktails :-P, there was always someone at reception if you needed any help, found them very helpful when having to arrange my transfer allowed me to use their phone. There are safes available for the week (15euros).
reviews.title: Excellent Value For Money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Area - hotel is along the main strip, but at the top end so you are near to everything but just that bit further away from the hustle and bustle. Large supermarket 5min walk has everything you can think of all fair prices. another two smaller supermarkets left to the hotel.
reviews.title: Lovely friendly place!

reviews.text: Myself husband and 10 y o daughter have just returned from here 21/8 - 28/8 we booked independently and Maria was very helpful in her emails etc and we felt the price was good. Apartments are very clean , they are quite basic, we were on the middle floor I would def recommned middle or top floor. Our apartment was cleaned daily and towels changed mid week , bedding changed probably twice I'm not sure to be honest. Snack bar near pool we only had drinks there but food looked good, lovely bar on the front of apartments that opened in the evening very chilled atmosphere, Supermarket close by Konstantinos which had a huge choice and we looked at the other supermarkets prices it seemed a bit cheaper at Konstantinos ( looking at apartments its to the left past saigitarrius). It took us 10 - 15 mins to walk to beach, bus stops nearby if you want to get out and about , lots of very good restaurants. We had a fab time ! my only slightly negative comment is that we didnt find everyone friendly at the apartments I know others have said Maria etc lovely which she is but we did think some of the other staff could have cheered up a bit.
reviews.title: Lovely holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: for self catering you wont get better for staff service clean rooms pool side spottless the owners maria and vas to the maids stella at pool side bar lovely friendly people upstairs bar on entrance best bar id been in the whole strip really nice take no notice of the no sun after 4.00 afternoon plenty of beds just move to other side sun all day long all in all you get what you pay for this place is above average for the price one more thing got drunk left my wallet in room forgot about it 2000 cash inside credit cards my wallet wasleft under my pillow by kiki the maid nothing missing what more can i say you can trust this family run hotel top marks go back of course we will see you soon gary toni london
reviews.title: lovely place reccomend it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just arrived home from a week long stay at Marianna, and we were thrilled with the studios. We booked very last minute, so weren't really sure what to expect, but the reviews on here turned out to be spot on and we had a great week!
reviews.title: A gem of a place-we'd love to return!

reviews.text: The studios are spotless, as are all the common areas, and rooms are cleaned to an amazing standard 6 days a week. On first glance it may seem that the pool area is quite small, but in reality it is more than ample. Even at the busiest times of the day we never struggled to get a sunbed, and the pool was never overcrowded. The snack bar has a wide range of snacks at very reasonable prices and is open throughout the day.
reviews.title: Great Place and Well Worth a Visit Marianna Studios thankyou

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location of the hotel is great- only a 5 minute walk to the beach along the main road in Tingaki, a large supermarket a few doors away, and the best restaurant in the area next door (Sagitarrius). It is located at the quiet end if the street, so is perfect if you fancy a quiet night during your stay.
reviews.title: Warning if booking this accomodation with Teletext Holidays Direct (Med Hotels)
